dmca.title: U.K. search user complains of "incitement to racial hatred"
dmca.body:
I was surfing the web using Google search engine, and came across an entry including the following:

Archives67
......White anthropology:.....Self-publishing heralds
the death of Jewish mind control
and........way........
vanguardnewsnetwork.com/archives67.htm - 99k

The terms I searched under were:
self-publishing, anthropology, music, Africa, Israel, Jewish, and this website was shown on the first page of results.

I didn't go into the website because I didn't want to be upset by what the contents promised to be - certainly racist to the extreme, incitement to racial hatred, and therefore illegal.

It is of extreme importance and urgency that such websites should not be accessed through Google (or any other search engine) - at all, let alone so easily and quickly. Please explain how this came to be, and what you intend to do about it. I have passed the information on to a racism-monitoring agency.


[Private] D.Phil (Oxon), MA(Econ)
